<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Suppression des Flow créés dans l'application "Stock Movement"</description>
        <name>BLI Delete Flow Application Stock Moveme</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info("*********************************");
gs.info("Processing flow Delete");
gs.info("*********************************");

var FlowBLI = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_flow');
FlowBLI.addEncodedQuery('sys_idSTARTSWITH55fc428c830f2e9048d6ccc6feaad351');
FlowBLI.query();
	if (FlowBLI.next()) {
		var BLIScope = FlowBLI.sys_scope;
		gs.print("Scope: " + BLIScope);
		FlowBLI.deleteRecord();
	}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
